Welcome to my PERSONAL HELL

I am an: artist, developer, designer, and a writer. Check out a full list of my links on my personal LinkGarden, or use the N A V menu at the top to explore.

... and here's where I keep all of my brain juice:

REVOSA Knit Sweater [Ankh]


02 Oct 2015

First new product today is another applier garment, a kind of warm knit “sweater” with an ankh sewn into the fabric!

Following this product I’ll be doing two more before I return to finishing up the mesh part of my first clothing line, and then will likely move onto cybernetic arms.

The package for this sweater includes a tattoo layer and the usual Maitreya applier HUD.

REVOSA Skeleton Hands Bra


01 Oct 2015

Another piece of clothing from REVOSA just in time for the holiday season. What holiday? Halloween!

Grab this spooky (or spoopy) bra before the best season of the year is over! Cause you’re sure going to look awkward standing around a turkey with skeleton hands across your breasts.

Or would you?

Nevertheless, stay tuned for more totally sweet mesh and applier clothing!

[NEW} REVOSA Loveless Tattoo Sleeve


01 Oct 2015

For my first release today is another (yes, another!) first in the REVOSA clothing, tattoo and makeup line, an awesome set of tattoo sleeves that I’ve dubbed “loveless.”

You might notice the Maitreya Lara logo on this ad, and that’s because with Omega, I noticed I was only making appliers for Maitreya, so I figured, why not just go grab the official Maitreya dev kit and eliminate a step from putting on your stuff?

And, I have to say, the Maitreya appliers are even easier to work with.

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29

[NEW] REVOSA Fishnet Stockings [Inverted Crosses]


30 Sep 2015

Brand new in the REVOSA clothing line are these fishnet stockings! Comes in a pack with classic layer stocking tattoo and Omega appliers for Maitreya Lara.

I think it’s safe to say that REVOSA is now selling pretty much everything!

Besides shoes, I guess. But that’s another area I’ll be delving into once I feel that my base clothing line is complete. Come check them out inworld are right on the marketplace.

[NEW] REVOSA Energy Zip-up Jacket! Delicious!


29 Sep 2015

Since the inception of REVOSA and with just about every single product I’ve sold, I’ve also given away a free energy drink with all packages.

I have no idea how many people have purchased items from me, but I assume that very many people have at least one REVOSA Energy Drink stashed in their inventory.

So, today, I decided to make a jacket very much in the style of other energy drink product jackets, and now you can represent the tangy sweet drink and get a caffeine high! Of course, it comes in 5 sizes, includes an alpha, and if you have any fitting issues, I am here to help!

You might be wondering if I’ll ever make men’s themed clothes, and I would like to, maybe, at some point, although I lack an adequate man avatar, along with dude sizes for my Blender projects. Plus, being heavily female oriented as I am (bisexual leaning lesbian), I’m not really losing any sleep over making clothing that mostly caters to women. Sorry guys!

I do want to learn how to make appliers, because I have some nifty ideas for tattoos and stockings, but have no idea how appliers work. But anyway…

Marketplace listing: https://marketplace.secondlife.com/p/REVOSA-Energy-Zip-up-Jacket/7813930

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29

> > > read more

[NEW] REVOSA Black Tank Top


28 Sep 2015

My second release for today, and at a much more “natural” time, is the “black” tank top.

Tired of other colors usurping the heir to the throne of darkness? Now you can tell the world how you feel about that with this lady’s tank top!

This top, like my others, comes in six sizes! Extra extra small, extra small, small, medium, large and extra large. If for some reason none of these fit you, I would be more than happy to help out! My customer’s happiness is important, afterall.

Marketplace listing: https://marketplace.secondlife.com/p/REVOSA-Black-Tank-Top/7809868

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29
